title: Normal Drafts while ranked is unavailable
body: Wouldn't it be a good idea to implement normal drafts just for the time period that ranked is unavailable? Just so we wouldn't have to face some certain champions that we wouldn't want to face *cough* {{champion:157}} *cough*

replies.body: Seems like a nice idea. Riot tries new things every preseason/season so I guess this may be a thing soon.

Why not make it permanent :D? (My guess is player base argument) But I'm willing to bet some people are happy to wait an extra three minutes, to avoid having to negotiate with potatoes in normal blind pick.
i just find it funny how NA have normal draft xD
Would be cool. Not going to happen though
Ranked will only be down for like half an hour as far as I am aware. No need for this. Go eat a sandwich, watch some youtube, take a nap. Ranked won't be gone that long.
